reviewText: this is a great movie i could watch this movie every day i really love it thank you so much

Punch is a tough guy bar bouncer.  Judy thinks he is a gentle Teddy Bear.  Pierre Brault is fascinating as a short man with a rep as unbeatable. Brigitte Robinson is the charming woman who totally mis-reads him, but they fall in love anyway.  Graham Greene, well-known Native American actor is flawless as always. From back cover "A comedic tale of love and misunderstanding.
